name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior DevOps Engineer with 8 years of experience, I am proficient in **AWS**, **Terraform**, **CI/CD**, **Docker**, and **Kubernetes**, driving robust cloud infrastructure and seamless deployment processes. My technical background includes strong programming skills in **Python**, alongside scripting abilities in **Bash** and **PowerShell**, ensuring efficient automation and system integration. I excel in implementing DevOps culture, enhancing collaboration between development and operations teams.

In addition to my DevOps expertise, I hold substantial full-stack development experience with technologies such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, particularly within the healthcare and financial sectors. I have led teams to develop enterprise-grade platforms that incorporate AI/ML features for predictive analytics and real-time data processing. Furthermore, I possess a solid understanding of compliance standards including HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, alongside a foundation in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, ensuring the delivery of secure and scalable applications.
